Package pt.isec.pa.tinypac.model.fsm

Interface ITinyPacState

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameOverState, GameWinState, MoveGhostState, MovePacmanState, NextLevelState, StartGameState, TinyPacStateAdapter, VulnerableGhostState
public interface ITinyPacState
Interface com todos os metodos necessarios para a gestão da maquina de estados
